app_info.name: FitTracker Pro
app_info.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking app that monitors workouts, nutrition, and health metrics

info_plist_entries.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: FitTracker needs access to read your health data to display your fitness progress
info_plist_entries.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: FitTracker needs access to save workout data to your Health app
info_plist_entries.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FitTracker uses your location to track outdoor workouts and calculate distance
info_plist_entries.NSCameraUsageDescription: FitTracker uses the camera to scan food barcodes for nutrition tracking

known_issues: Occasional sync delay with HealthKit data

concerns: Is my HealthKit usage description detailed enough?
Do I need to provide test account credentials for the premium subscription?
